options.title: Full or Partial Lump Sum
options.content:
We need to speak to you in order
to update you about any progress
with your retirement claim. Please
get in touch.

options.title: Drawdown
options.content: Which stage of the process are you at?

options.title: I have requested a Retirement pack and haven haven’t received it.
options.content:
Your pack will be available to
view in the 'Documents'
section of your online account
within 2 working days after
requesting it, or it will arrive in
the post within 10 working
days.

If this amount of time has
already passed, please contact
us so we can look into this for
you.

options.title: I have completed and returned the retirement pack to you. I am waiting for a quote.
options.content:
Once we have received your
paperwork, we will send you a
quote within 9 working days.


Sometimes we need to speak
to you about your choices and
will have tried to contact you
during this time. If you have
been waiting longer than this,
please get in touch so we can
look into this for you.

options.title: I have completed and returned the quote pack to you. I am waiting for a payment of Tax Free Cash.
options.content:
Once we receive your
completed quote pack, your
Tax Free Cash payment will
reach your bank account
within 10 working days.


If you have been waiting
longer than this, please get in
touch so we can look into this
for you.

options.title: I have completed and returned the quote pack to you. I am waiting for a regular payment or adhoc payment.
options.content:
Unless you hear from us, we
will make your payment on
your chosen date.


If we receive your completed
paperwork but your date is
imminent, it may arrive up to
10 working days later. If your
payment has not arrived
during this time, please get in
touch.

options.title: Annuity
options.content:
We need to speak to you in order
to update you about any progress
with your retirement claim. Please
get in touch.

content: Which retirement option are you taking?
